评论详情: I was very disappointed when my workout buddy pointed out this hole that's forming. I just got these and this was the second time I worn them.  I absolutely loved them at first too. Breaks my heart.

I am usually a size medium and that’s what I ordered and this fit true to size.  This set was better quality than I expected. The shorts felt like they were going to be too small but as soon as I put them on they fit like a glove. They don’t ride up in the legs and don’t fall down in the band.  The straps on the top were a little wider than I’m used to, but I love the look and everything stayed in place during my HIIT workout.I’m not one to wear a matching set when working out, so I’m having fun mixing and matching this set with my other workout clothes, but could definitely see myself wearing this set together on vacation!  Overall very pleased with this purchase. The brown was an awesome choice- it has a little more of a maroon tint to it and it looks great!

评论概述: Cute and comfy not just for the gym
评论详情: Cute for all occasions. Wore this to the state fair and paired it with an oversize flannel. Match made in heaven. Also great for the gym.

Literally loved this set. Loved the color, loved the fit of the leggings. The legs fit me well. The only issue was the top. The straps were too long and can not be adjusted. I had to tie them together, which felt like it kind of defeated the purpose. Repurchasing smaller would make the leggings too tight. Overall- cute set, but would be better fitted for someone with a larger chest area.

Exactly like the picture except for the top and bottoms have more of a gap apart not so close together but not terrible. it’s ribbed and stretchy, not thin at all. I ordered the cream color so it’s exactly like the picture. I recommend staying true to size. I’m 5’7 and about 135, and a 2 or 4 in shorts and jeans and I ordered a medium and it fit great.

LOVE the way this set fits— so flattering! The material is nice and thick, and the texture of the fabric pulls you in. Easily my favorite thing to wear to the gym, as well as around town running errands. Originally I bought the orange set, and loved it so much I had to get the green!

It’s really what you should expect. I got it for a group outfit. The colour is much lighter than I expected but it’s a thick enough material and the shorts are not too too short although I would have wanted a little longer. No sweat spots showed and it was definitely hot. I personally definitely needed a bra (strapless 34DDD) it’s soft but the fuzzy soft that would pill if against anything else. For my one time wear it was perfectly fine.
This is a good material and it fits true to size. It’s very comfortable you could dress it up or down.

Absolutely love this set. True to size. Not see through at all. I’m 5’2” and struggle to find biker shorts that are a flattering inseam length and this set is the PERFECT length. The top is so comfortable, only complaint is that the right arm strap is sightly too long and slips off my shoulder every now and again, but the bra top is tight enough that it doesn’t affect the fit of your top. I already know the black is going to be a staple in my closet and I will *definitely* be ordering more colors.
I loved this product! It fits amazing, it’s so cute, & not expensive at all!

For ref I’m 5’1 109lbs & got medium. I find myself ordering mediums in these types of outfits. I can get in the small no problem but I don’t like it that tight & medium fine! The shoulder straps on this one are tiny but long but I will have my seamstress fix. The purple is GORGEOUS!!!!
Fit great

I got the cream set. It’s okay, definitely sheer so wear the appropriate underwear. I like the compression and how it sucks you in, but sheer so maybe I’ll try another color. This would be definitely great for working out or lounging around the house. I paired mine with a jeans jacket and some Steve Madden chunky cream sneaks, and a sling bag. It was a cute causal outfit for traveling.

I love the set but I’ve only worn it a few times and have experience multiple holes in the crotch stitching, so that makes me think it’s not the best quality. It isn’t see through and is very comfortable, just wish I didn’t have to re-sow the crotch stitching after a few wears!

I ordered this set in hopes of it being something cute and stretchy to wear while pregnant but also something that would fit long after my son is here. It did not disappoint! Super cute, not see through, stretchy….i love it. I’m 5’3ish and In the picture attached I’m around 20 weeks pregnant and about 127 lbs. Pre pregnancy I’m 120-123lbs. I’m usually a size small in most things, but I’ve found that when Amazon clothes shopping sizes vary greatly and often run smaller than anticipated. Based on reviews and sizing chart I went with a medium as some sports bra tops in small actually end up riding up and not quite fitting my chest area even if I’m overall petite. This size fits perfectly with my bump and I think it’ll fit just fine when my bump is gone.

评论概述: AMAZING!  HIGH-QUALITY & better than expensive brands & I’ve tried them ALL!
评论详情: I NEVER leave reviews but I’ve when I tell you I’ve SCOURED the internet for 1 year + looking for EXACTLY these! They’re ALL I wanted & better then expected! I’m getting every color! HIGH-QUALITY & have the same expensive-feeling thick ribbing ALL OVER! No pattern changes, no stupid round darker colored “circle” shapes on the butt either! I’m 5 ft, 4 in, fluctuate from 125-134 lbs due to Endometriosis that when fired up -gives me a little more tummy than usual & makes me very self conscious on my petite frame. The high-waisted band naturally sat above my belly button & snatched me in lovely, BUT I adjusted it lower to suck me in where I wanted to be & it did, plus it stayed there AND didn’t change how the bottoms looked OR bunch them up as MANY others do! Didn’t lose elasticity after10 hours & would’ve lasted longer, so def squat proof & Bonus = My Husband LOVED them & didn’t let me alone the whole night ❤️❤️ The top is padded & has the same thick band as the waist. My 36C’s fit with room but not loose either. I will say that though band doesn’t ride up - I did have to pull it down to makeup for a SMIDGE of slack on the straps, but still isn’t what I’d consider worthy of sewing. I hope this helps people looking for what I was & knowing they found it!
Great for quick little runs.

I really like this set. It is made of a relatively thick, ribbed material which is flattering on all bodies. I am approximately 160 lbs and usually wear a medium top and size 8-10 bottoms. I purchased this set in a size medium - which was right for the top. I do wish I could have purchased the bottoms separately as a large would fit me better. The waist band of the shorts rolls down ever so slightly and the bottom of the shorts ride up on my thighs some after movement. But, as a woman with thicker thighs, I find the riding up happens with virtually all shorts. I will say I still find this set to be comfortable, compressive/holds in the tummy, flattering, and is not see through. I intend to buy additional sets in more colors!

This outfit is really cute! It keeps everything tight and smooth out but my only complaint is the top. I think the straps are too wide apart so it falls down my shoulders a lot. The fabric is thick and not see through at all! I recommend to  try it!

It’s ok. I do not like that there’s no seam on the butt it makes it feel like a tight diaper. If there’s nothing else clean I’ll wear it but it’s also not very breathable and the size is not true to size. It’s small.

This set is amazing! Super cute and super cozy/soft. Material is very thick and well made, and the cream color is beautiful. It’s like an eggshell/ivory, looks pretty. As someone with a pooch, it does show it, but the color and quality is so good, I felt pretty enough to keep it. Definitely recommend.

评论概述: Over wear these and then some
评论详情: These are not see through. They are thick and stretchy. They suck everyrhing In. These are my go to leggings I love them. I ordered another pair. Gets my pansa in check for all occasions. The bra can be comfy however the straps are really long and not adjustable so it kinda looks weird on my chest. Overall great purchase

评论概述: Just buy it! Just buy a few!
评论详情: I bought the off white one first and would have given it a 5/5 but it can’t be worn alone. You can completely see your underwear through it. However one of the reasons I bought the color was so it could be worn under a few of my rompers and dresses. I absolutely love the fit, I got the XL, I’m at 12-14 typically, it fits perfect. So I bought 2 more colors, hoping they aren’t as see through🤞🖤🤎

I was worried that this workout fit was going to be like other ribbed leggings I got- I’ve bought a few pairs from other companies, and the last time I ordered a large they weren’t very stretchy and they were so difficult to get on over my curves. I found myself pulling them up and adjusting them constantly. This set is a DREAM!! It’s very form fitted but it’s stretchy and absolutely comfortable- I’m not pulling them up all the time or having to adjust them, I also love how flattering it is!! They fit true to size and are squat proof as well. Buy these!! They’re so cute and I’ll will definitely be ordering in more colors UPDATE- after hitting the gym I can say these do not show your sweat through the fabric AT ALL they’re my favorite sets now.

As soon as I’m done with this review, I’m going to purchase another set! Lol I love it! It’s perfect for my casual lifestyle. Very cute. Can be dressed up or down. My only thing about the cream colored one is that the pants are slightly see through, but I can live with that because a long shirt/cute jacket or a pair of nude underwear do the trick for me (brown skin). I’m definitely going back to get other colors!
I returned. I need pockets and a bra top that does not create uniboob. If you’re not concerned about these things then you’ll enjoy the stretch.
True to size, super chic and cute. The cream option is see through, you can see your underwear haha but wear nude underwear or none at all and you’re good! Lol

评论概述: I’m buying this in every color!!!!
评论详情: The one bad thing about this whole experience was I only bought one pair! I absolutely love the material. It is stretchy but not see through. There’s enough give to not feel like your getting squeezed like a tube of toothpaste. The material is high quality and I will not lie I did not wear anything underneath and felt fully supported and even better then the trusty dusty Victoria secret bra. If you stuck around this long to read this just know these dang things are worth every scent and I will be buying in bulk so get it while the gettings good..

I’m 5’0” and my weight fluctuated so much during the pandemic and went up to 155/160. I’ve been struggling to find stuff that fits me online and I guess I count as “plus size” now. These were SO comfortable. Just ONE thing! If you’re going to buy the BROWN one, don’t! The color is off! Other than that it was a great buy. I got it in black and red as well. The brown is way too close to the red color and nothing like the shade in the picture.

Ok so I’m three months postpartum but I still like to wear pieces that make me look and feel confident. This set is just that! It has good stretch and holds everything in without feeling sucked in lol the bra hides my nursing pads very well and it’s easy to fold up to feed my LO. The bottoms are bit sheer but I normally tie a flannel or jacket around my waste anyway. However, you can wear beige or white underwear and it was fix the sheerness too. I basically feel like a milf when wearing this and just ordered another color! Pre pregnancy I’m about 130 pounds, but I’m currently 5’8” and weigh 160 pounds. I got the large and it’s great. Buy it!

This was such a surprise hit. I was skeptical bc the material could be a hit or miss. But it fit so well. It is so flattering. It definitely shows underwear lines, but not sheer at all. The bra was solid and I felt comfortable doing an intense workout, knowing I’d be supported. The shorts suck the problem areas in. And the band is that perfect size: wide enough to pull up, but not too wide to feel like a panel. The best part however is the material. It feels so much more expensive than it is. I think it’s almost too thick of a material that it might be hot to workout in. But definitely this is the best chill outfit.

I’m 250lbs. 5’9. I am curvy but do have stomach. I got a size large. It had the“too small long crotch” look in the front so I turned the tights around. FIT PERFECT. An Xl would’ve gave the same fitted look without the jumping up & down to get on. But once on. Comfortable like any other contorur tights. The top was fine but I have small boobs. A little sheer but nothing to complain about. I’m going to order other colts!
Loved it super thick material great quality not see through
Love it I want more colors of it

I bought this for casual wear and for working out. This is easily one of the best purchases I've made when it comes to plus sized clothing. The color is beautiful, the quality is amazing, and it fits like a glove, it's super stretchy and yet fits snug enough so I don't have to adjust everything constantly. Here is the best part: NO CHAFING!!! When I get more money I am DEFINITELY buying more colors😂.  For reference I am 5'5" and 230LBS

I’m 5’6”, 150-160 pounds, hourglass figure, torso and leg length pretty equal. I’m usually a medium size 8/10. Wide hips. Usually large is too big but this large fits perfectly. I decided on large when I read reviews. Love this set and will get more colors!  If you’re taller, would work too because there is a little more length in crotch for me but still comfortable and doesn’t look weird. Black isn’t sheer. Perfect matching set! Go up a size 100% unless you like extra tight look. I’m sure medium could of worked for me too but large is way better for comfort.

First off I love the material. It’s ribbed and soft and the perfect amount of stretch but also holds you in. It’s amazing to move around in and overall so comfortable. The one downfall I have is I ordered a Medium based off reviews and I love the way the pants feel but the straps aren’t snug on my shoulders and slip down every so often. I think I’ll try a small next time and hope it fits a little better and that the pants aren’t too snug.

The white bottoms are definitely sheer. I am wearing white underwear and it just didn’t help. Pretty sure you can see my underwear line clearly in person, in the photo it’s not super bad. So I guess I’m going commando in these? Or find a white thong? Idk. But the fabric is great and no cameltoe issues!  The top fit well around my torso but the straps are very long (I ordered an overall large). I probably should have bought the top separate as a medium.

I absolutely am obsessed with this 2 piece! It's very flattering and I love the fit! So much that I hopped online and ordered 3 more colors, and may even order ALL the colors at some point! LOL  I personally don't wear these to work out in as the fabric is too thick and tight for me to work out in. I purchased these just to lounge around the house in on lazy days, and those days when I slip off my work clothes, but don't want to wear my PJ's , so I put these on.  I would think if i were to wear these to work out, I may go a size up, but  I  just plan on keeping these as lounge-y clothes!! OBSESSED!

So I don't write reviews too often but I'm hoping this will help another woman out. I don't see many other women who look like me or have similar body structure. I'm 4'11 with a very athletic built. I weigh around 125ish. I have thick thighs and smaller waist. When I first took it out I was like nooooo way am I going to like this but it actually fits super well! The other reviews were right about it not giving you a camel toe which is gold!! Hugs in all the right places. If I were to order it again I might go with medium just because it is a little snug but not enough where I'm returning it. Hope this helps!

It looked good, I guess. But it was a little tighter than I would have wanted and honestly, the top was more like a sports bra . It doesn't quite cover as much of the torso as I thought and the shorts will squish you flat as a pancake if you have any kind of booty meat back there. I'd size up if I were to do it all over again. ( I bought small)

I’m 5’3” about 150 lbs, bit curvy in the legs and behind so I ordered a large in these blue ones! I have these in white and brown in medium. Those are great but really suck you in and over a few washes, they have shrunk. Still fit but are pretty tight and not comfy to sleep in. If you want leggings to suck you in get your size, if you want them comfy, size up one. They are very high waisted, fold down when you sit but don’t roll down on me. I love them!

Nice thick ribbed  material. It’s not tooo tight which is nice, the stretch is just right the shorts feel snug around waist and the booty part has some give to it so your booty and legs are not constricted the only down side is I got the ivory color and the back of the shorts is somewhat sheer but I always wear these sets with large open jackets or denim shirt on the waist so it’s not a problem for me. The top has padded inserts already. Overall very cute set im 5’0 ft 121 lbs and wear 34C the small is a perfect fit!

Overall I really like this outfit. I like pairing it with a cute oversized button up or wearing it by itself. It holds my body together and adds a nice shape to my body. I liked it so much that I decided to buy another in a different color. My only issue was I bought a med the first time and felt like I wanted a little more room so I bought a lrg in another color, but it still felt the same. That’s really my only complaint.
I had to return it because it fit very oddly, as it would crease in different places. The color is kind of see through too so be mindful when choosing a color.

评论概述: Good fit. Color not as described.
评论详情: Ordered this set in "Navy Blue" and Black. Good fit, material ribbed. For reference, I'm 5'1, 135 pounds and 32DDD and the medium fit great. Not a complaint, more of an observation. The Navy Blue is definitely a royal blue. Will order other colors in the future.

This set looks just as good on as it does online. Definitely met my expectations. Second time wearing the bottoms my only problem is that they tend to Roll up or down but I think it’s because I got a medium I actually have a lot of room as these are very soft and extremely stretchy. Very comfortable so you can just chill and relax but also durable enough to work out in. I was worried the bra wouldn’t offer much support since it’s one strap but I had no issues. I honestly want to try this set in different colors. And likely I will Lol

评论概述: Color is not like the pic
评论详情: I was hoping it would look more rust color the pic but it's definitely brown

I took away a star but only so people read this. I wear a size 16-18 and thought a large might fit… I look like a can of busted biscuits… that’s not the products fault but I wanted people to know it’s not for us mid to plus size people!

This is one of my all time favorite go-to lounge wear sets! It’s comfy, it’s stylish, it’s chic. No more chafing on your inner thighs, this fit has got you covered! It’s stretchy and hugs your body in all the right places. It’s ribbed material gives almost like a compression feeling holding everything in without making you feel like you’re wearing spanx. I love to wear this during my period because the compression feels good when I’m cramping + it’s comfortable and easy to dress up while still meeting your needs to wear something that doesn’t require a lot of thought or energy (iykyk). I’m 5’7” approx 160lbs and I bought a Large. Love it so much I’m buying it in multiple colors! Perfect for the beach too!

I love this set. It is as good quality as the ones I ordered from another brand. I simply ordered from this brand because it was available in NAVY. This is NOT NAVY. It's more like dark blue like good medium dark blue.

I really wasn’t expecting much but honestly LOVE this set. I am 5’3” a size 12/14 and have 36DDD and this fit well my only complaint is the leggings are very high waisted for a shorter person. The spot I wanted cinching my lower belly was up much higher. Could probably work great as maternity leggings. Top was not as long-lined as I wanted. But overall fabric was a flattering texture, color was vibrant and material is soft I’d definitely get in another color
Size medium 5'8" 135 lbs the compression in these is so flattering!

For reference, I'm 5'6", 118lbs, bra size 32A, 24" waist, and typically wear a size small. I ordered a size small for this set. The top fit perfectly, but the bottoms were way too small. They were a little uncomfortable, but tolerable while standing. When trying to sit they are VERY uncomfortable. Too much pressure, and they gave me muffin top, even when trying to sit up straight and sucking in. I later ordered a medium. This time the bottoms fit, but the top was a little too big. There were gaps around the arms, and the straps would stay upright on their own.

I love the material and the fact thea there was some stretch. Just needs a bit more stretch. I'm a large and like my tights to fit tight to hold my belly in. I couldn't get the pants on to make it to my thighs. Need larger sizes perhaps.  New review.... i bought an large and fits much better. A bit easier to get on and still has that snatched look. Will purchase again.
I love these outfits the only thing that I dislike is the straps don’t have a tight fit like everything else but that’s not a big deal for me. Getting more colors.

I love these types of sets and was on the fence about getting this one. Finally snagged it during Prime Day and I am slightly disappointed. Its fine, and I by no means have the same body type as the model but its an odd fit. I liked the shorts, but the top is not made for a busty gal who doesn't want it all hanging out. Ultimately I would try to size up to see if the top is better but not in a rush. Does the job for now, glad I tried it.

The color is perfect. The fabric is thick enough to not be see through - underwear shows when bending, but not offensive. The top fits me a bit weird, a bit loose in the straps. Overall I like the set. It’s not too thick to wear in Florida :)
This product is great. The material is amazing and it snatches you in the right places. I felt super good wearing this.
I’m 5’10”, 150lbs slim/athletic build, 36c. I ordered a medium and both pieces fit well. Pants were just above ankles. The material does catch easily. I got a little pull on my pants from my ring.

评论概述: Very comfortable but the color looks nothing like the picture
评论详情: The fitting is very nice but the color is nothing like in the picture it’s more of a orangish color not brown or tan-ish DISAPPOINTMENT but I made it work

Yes yes yes yes I always read reviews before I buy and a 4.3 isn’t bad it’s also not like wow I must buy. BUTTT it’s amazing! It makes me feel so comfortable and confident! This is a size large. I throw it in the dryer so I sized up. I’m buying another one rn 😅

评论概述: If you want to be a baddie… Get this!
评论详情: Got this set for the recovery pet of my bachelorette party, and I’m contemplating wearing this as my party outfit! Oh my god I’m OBSESSED WITH HOW I LOOK IN THIS SET! The sleeves are thick and sturdy, squat proof (even in white!), and it sucks everything in! There’s not a lot of stretch though, but enough to get your ass in the pants (of you’re as blessed as I am with a thick booty!) For reference, I’m 5”5’, 160lbs, size 36B. BUY THIS SET!!! I’m buying this in all the colors!!! I got a medium based on measurements

评论概述: If in between two sizes size down
评论详情: I am 5’4 160lbs 32 inches waist 42in hips and a B cup And I was In between two sizes (med &large) so I went for the large but it was too big especially in the short length and in top straps. I could possibly wear it but it is too roomy and not as flattering as a size down

Fits great in every way! Great, yet comfortable compression, holds in the girls and it’s the perfect length. I’m 5’ and they fall right about my ankle. They’re thick and opaque and even in the summer they’re great to wear in the heat. This outfit is so cute & multi functional. I’ll be ordering more colors for sure!!

评论概述: Love them! But I should have gone up a size
评论详情: I really love this set, it's super comfy, I just feel like the shorts are sized a little small. I wear a medium in pretty much everything and the medium shorts are a bit smaller than I was expecting.  The top is true to size and is very flattering!

I loved the two piece, but tell me why the thread unraveled in the butt area. So glad it didn’t do that while I was in the restaurant. I’m thinking it’s not big butt friendly that’s all. Other than that it’s a really good material & has awesome stretch for the most part.

I wore this to go zip lining! I give it 10/10. Its not sheer at all and it fit perfectly! Its super stretchy. Im 5’3 198 36-32-51. It was thick and kept me warm in the cool Texas weather with a light jacket. I’d definitely purchase in more colors. It’s super durable and looked great on my body. I have a large thighs and a large butt and it fit me well.

It’s fits really good! I was hesitant to buy it because I’ve never ordered from Amazon before, but I’m glad I did. You can wear it without a bra it keeps you secured. I’m 5’5 250 pounds my boobs are G cup. It’s perfect I wish they had more colors and a more sizes to.

I have another outfit with similar material but it is far thicker than this one, I like the thick fabric because it feels like it holds everything in place better. The stomach area in these pants is a little lackluster, it offers no support but the set is adorable and worth it

The set is cute. The set is thick. The material feels as if it will get lint balls on it easily when washing it. For it to be close to $40 I expect it to be brand new. I opened the package today. I received it with stains on it. The bra top clearly has deodorant stains near the arm pit area. This is unacceptable. The company needs to be more careful and attentive when shipping out for new orders. I’m looking for a new-used experience. I paid for new and new is what I am due. Other than that, the color is nice and true to photo and it has, from what I can tell, good stretch to it. I don’t know that it is with $40 tho. $29.99 at most.

评论概述: Very nice quality! But would recommend sizing up
评论详情: I am normally a size medium, but decided to size up based on reviews. I am sure I would have fit into a meduim just as easily, but the large size offers a “snug” fit versus a “tight” or stretched fit. The Large fits perfect on me (5’6”, 135lbs and 36C bust). I ordered this in the cream/beige color which looks exactly like the photo. It is on the sheer side for the bottoms, so nude underwear would be best. That being said, the material is nice, thicker, quality. The top comes with built in pads that aren’t flimsy. Definitely would recommend!
I love it but it's too big for. I'm ordering an L

评论概述: Perfect Two-Piece for workouts & for socials
评论详情: I love this two piece! Thick material. Perfect amount of stretch and hold. Not cheap quality at all. Holds in all the right places. For curvy women, it holds in the stomach and makes the peach look very nice. For women with bigger chest, the top secures the girls, and there padding for the nips. No bra needed, if you feel comfortable. I order the off white, and there was no sheerness to it. Everything held up nicely. Order it! I’m ordering in a few colors!

The material is very durable without being too thick. There is low to medium compression that sucks all your puffy or chunky bits in and smooths your curves out. I'm 5'5"and got a medium and it fit perfectly even though I'm bottom heavy and sometimes need a large for pants. Love that you can wear the set alone or throw on and oversized long sleeve shirt for a more sophisticated look. Would definitely recommend as a closet staple.

I’m normally medium on work out pants But when it comes to this type of material which is very stretchy but at the same time hugs your body in place I will normally get Small. For reference I’m 34DD and the top fits perfect. The shorts are a bit see through, but I wear a nude underwear and you don’t see anything. Love it I’m planning to order more colors. Disclaimer this is not an sponsor review is my honest opinion. I’m 137 pounds & 5.4 height.
True to size . Not stretchy . If you have bigger boobs it will be a sports bra instead of crop top.
I bought this for my daughter for Puerto Rico the shipping was fast, color was as pictured the only thing is a lil are through and slouch in the front but very good two piece

评论概述: I bought this from 3 diff companies to find the best quality and THIS IS IT
评论详情: For some dumb reason this is being made my multiple companies without bra liner and you can see your nips. This is the only one I bought that comes with bra liner/ padding in the one-strap-style so you don't look like a hussie. Best one. Pants are a bit thin and you can see my black underwear and liner but this is so cute I'd go commando just for it. Or buy seamless underwear.
I wore this to an outdoor music festival and was turning heads left and right, its super cute, my only gripe is that it roll down when bending hence 4/5 stars
This is good quality material and looks like the photo. Fit a little tight on the legs, I’m a size xsmall /small (they do have some stretch though) and top fit true to size

I found these and I read a review about no camel toe, so I gave it a try- GOOD NEWS! This was correct. I did some squats and all. It looks small when you open it, but it is Stretchy. I'm 5'5 160 and ordered a medium. If you are getting the lighter colors, be sure to not wear black underwear under the pink, that will be seen, but not too bad.

Absolutely love this set! I’ve already sent the link to multiple gf’s to purchase. It’s thick and comfortable. I love to do Pilates classes and hate when the leggings slide down and I have to keep pulling them up. These didn’t slide at all and stayed in place the whole time. Very flattering and I am wearing a size medium! Enjoy ladies 😉

I would size up, unless you have a flat belly. I’m a true medium in most bottoms /tops. 132 lbs, 5’4. This was not flattering on me at all, the bottoms were so tight my thighs were sticking out like biscuits along with my belly rolls. I also have a big a** and I feel like the waist wasn’t long enough in the back/ it fell a little short of high waisted. This all probably would be fine if I went up a size though. The material is luxurious, very thick. If it fit the way I was hoping/it should have I would give it 5/5 stars.

I ordered a different set like this one but from a different brand and there is a clear quality difference between this one and others. It’s really nice and comfortable material that is not see through at all and I got the light blue color. I will say that i sized up because I would normally be a medium but it was really tight around my thighs so I got a large abs it was perfect. Overall a really great set :)

The best part of this set is the bra! the support and volume honey yaasss. However the straps are kind of long and when you're working out it definitely will not stay up on your shoulders. The pants are a bit tight but they are thick enough to really hold you in. I recommend this set for people are into the athleisure look that are not really going to work out at all. The color is cute too.
I love the fit and texture of the material.  I ordered one size up so a medium instead of a small and I’m happy I did!  I wanna get them in all colors.

评论概述: Awkward fit for an athletic body type
评论详情: I was really excited to get this set, but found it pretty awkward fitting. The top runs a bit small and the pads sat oddly on my breasts (luckily they are removable). The shoulder straps are also too far apart. I have broad shoulders and the straps still lie too far out, making it feel like they are constantly slipping off my shoulders. The bottoms fit a bit better, but still awkward. I have strong, but lean legs and the pants are tight around my thighs, but too loose around my waist. I feel like I have to constantly pull them up as they slouch off my hips. Te fabric is nice and a good thickness. They are very soft and it’s a good lounge set, but not ideal for the gym.

Love the fit. So comfortable. Only thing is my straps keep falling off my shoulders. I don’t know if it’s to wide. But I can’t go down a size because then it won’t fit on my chest. Other then that. Super cute.

This set will suction you up in all the right places. It is a thick material and is very flattering. It was worth the money I am thinking about buying another pair. Don't walk don't skip run and get you a pair.

评论概述: Love it! Just one small thing I didn’t like.
评论详情: The bottoms are soooo flattering. I love the way the fit. The top straps are just a little too long for me. But I still love the set and get so many compliments. Also they’re squat proof. ♥️
This is a really cute set that fits true to size. I usually wear a L and that’s what I got and it fits great!

Cute, I’m 6ft tall 140lbs and got the XS, that is how stretch these are. Color holds up after washes, cute set. Buy it! I wish the straps were tighter as some times they slide off my shoulders but not a deal breaker
It runs a little small but is super stretchy. It’s a nice think material and has removable padding in brad
I ordered this set in the white/cream color. It fits great! Love the stretch and it’s very cute. The bottoms are see through, very disappointing but I will try another color.

Love this! The color is vibrant and just like the photos. The material is great, very stretchy and thick, not cheap dealing at all. I usually wear a small but sized up per the other reviews. I ordered a medium and it fits perfect. I’m 5’0 and 117 lbs and wear a 34d.

When I first put this on I was pleased with the purchase. However, after an hour of wearing this set, I noticed a few nuisances. First, the straps to the top were too baggy and kept sliding off my shoulders. I tried to fix this by pulling the sports bra down, but it was too revealing of my cleavage. Next, the tights were not flattering in the back and wear baggy in the butt area.
I wanted to love it but it was totally see through. I have bought same type of material but thicker for a cheaper price. Not worth it!

I have purchased outfits like this before and the pants have been completely see-through. This outfit is not see-through at all.  The material is thick with a decent amount of stretch to give you the support you need if you plan on working out but not super stretchy. I love it I will definitely be purchasing different colors. Please size up I am a small but I purchased a medium I am 53 and 147 pounds.

Okay, the spandex is incredible. It's soft and holds everything in place. I can't say enough about how amazed I am at the quality of the material. I wish I could buy them separately. The top was a bit big on the shoulder straps. - Noting I can't fix by taking in an inch. The pants I could use a size up. I got the set on a medium. I don't know if I should return the set for it a large because I like the fit on the top but not the bottom.
